actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent, and extend to 100 percent, the deduction for health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.

summary.text: Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the income tax deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals to: (1) increase from 25 percent to 100 percent the allowable deduction; and (2) make the deduction permanent (under current law it will expire after tax year 1989).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent, and extend to 100 percent, the deduction for health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.
